name: RadioCompartiendoEsperanza
0:
”Alexa, open sharing hope radio”
”Alexa, ask sharing hope radio for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start sharing hope radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sharing hope radio
des:
Listen to the best Hispanic Christian online radio station. Play music, health tips, spiritual guides and more to improve your life and help to be closer to God. The majority of our content is introduced into Spanish.

You can play by saying "Alexa, play sharing hope radio", "Alexa pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
